page.title: Home
page.text: I am a software engineer from Rhineland Palatinate, DE.

box1.title: First Programming Experiences
box1.description: I became interested in programming at the age of 12 and acquired basic skills in web development by teaching myself HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. At the age of 14, I also started gaining initial experiences with the Android platform and developed a Chat App for Android using Kotlin. Additionally, during the 2020 pandemic, I developed a game using the Unity Game Engine and C#.

box2.title: Part-Time Job as an Assistant
box2.description: At the age of 15, I began working part-time at Zewotherm GmbH alongside my school. I continued this job until the start of my apprenticeship in August 2021.

box3.title: Attainment of Middle School Certificate
box3.description: I obtained my Middle School Certificate in the summer of 2021 from IGS Remagen before commencing my apprenticeship.

box4.title: Apprenticeship as an Application Developer (FIAE)
box4.description: I began my apprenticeship as an Application Developer (FIAE) at Zewotherm GmbH and am expected to complete it in the summer of 2024. During my apprenticeship, I significantly expanded my knowledge in web development and gained valuable experience in the field of Mobile Development.

box5.title: Development of a Flutter App alongside Apprenticeship
box5.description: In my pursuit of continuous knowledge expansion, I developed apps with Flutter alongside my apprenticeship. These apps were created in conjunction with NestJS backends, MongoDB, Apache Kafka, and various other tools, and I successfully published them.
